dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#38)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[Private]
March 02, 2004

Google, Inc.
[Private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that was originally published on http://www.marketingpower.com/live/content14922.php and which I, the original author, have also published on http://www.seologic.com/faq/search-engine-optimization.php

	Search Query: "naturally attract visitors by winning top ranking on the major search engines" http://www.google.com/search?q=%22naturally+atttact+visitors+by+winning+ top+ranking+on+the+major+search+engines%22&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&filter=0

Infringing Web Pages: http://www.nobs1.com/Search-engine-optimization.htm
2. 	My Contact Information: [Private]

3.	Infringer's Contact Information:
NoBS Technology
[Private] [Web Development] [Private]@Nobs1.com
[Private] [Computer Sales & Service] [Private]@Nobs1.com
[Private] [Programming] [Private]@Nobs1.com
[Private] [Database Design & System Analysis] [Private]@Nobs1.com
Administrator [Administrative Issues] [Private]@Nobs1.com
Service [Questions / Problems / Scheduling] [Private]@Nobs1.com

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner of am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[Private], CEO
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
p. [Private]
e. [Private]@internetmadeeasy.com
